name: Openedex India Pvt Ltd
overview:
Spanedea is an online marketplace for live and interactive teaching. On Spanedea, students and teachers meet in a virtual class, which is typically held in a 1-to-1 or very small class format. The virtual classroom is equipped with a shared writing board, screenshare facilities, audio & video interaction tools.

For teachers, Spanedea provides support in - operations, demand generation, marketing, apart from being the provider of the technology infrastructure.

For students Spanedea attempts to be a personalized and flexible learning options provider, whether it is choosing a global teacher, course, time or location.

Description of Service: Teachers (and counselors) create their personal profile pages and courses with comprehensive course outlines. The profiles and courses pages are open to viewing by prospective students. Teachers are able to create their own course structures and multiple formats for courses as per preferred methods of pedagogy. Teachers are also able to choose ‘working hours’ and course schedules. Also, teachers set their own rates.

Students chose teachers and courses. They can book classes through calendars. At the scheduled class time, the teacher delivers the live class over the Internet to the students through the virtual classroom.
